name: Random Fill
description:
Quickly fill a selection with random colors from a predefined palette in your Color Styles.


This plugin finds all selected elements (shapes, frames, groups, text layers, etc) and any nested layers with a "fill" property and applies a color randomly from any color style with "~random" included in the name.


To easily create your palette, select all color styles you want to include in it and right click "Add new folder." Name your folder "~random" and voila, the plugin will only pull colors from that folder.


Note: Name is case sensitive! Make sure to write "~random" exactly as it is here, with the lowercase "r".


Hot tip: Mac users can bind the plugin to an App Shortcut in System Preferences for quick access to iterate until you find a random combination you like.
